title: 004: 2015 New Years Fitness Strategery
description: 2015 is here and it is time to get fit! Sal, Adam and Justin reveal how to choose a club, how to get the best deal on a membership, how to stick to a plan and how to hire a personal trainer. They reveal some of the deepest, darkest secrets that the fitness industry doesn't want you to know and some side-splitting tales from the time they managed large fitness chains.
